The shirt is just as advertised in the photos and looks great in person. The material is a thicker t-shirt fabric, and the printing on it is well done. The only issue I came across is that i personally wish that I would've sized down for a better fit. The hemming on the bottom is awkward to style if you go for a too oversized look.
